content: onnaam shushroosha
(eniyono- kaadeeshodashreeshkintthe)

aadaam makkalkkuththaanam vaagdattham che-ython mashihaa!
Nin sharanatthil nidritharaam bhaktharkkarulanamu-ththa-aanam

thaalkkaalikamaam-vaasattheennatiyaane nee-kkiya mashihaa!
Kanivotu kykkollanamivane vidhiyathilettaruthe-naathaa!

Velivaayellaam-thrukkannaal kaanum mashihaa-raajaave!
Nin mahimodayadivasatthil ivanute kara velivaa-kka-lle.

Nin sharanatthil-nidrithanaam daasanu mashihaa-smruthi nalki
nin mahimodayadivasatthil valabhaagatthaayu che-rkke-nam.

Svarggakavaatam-bhedikkum parudeesin thaa-kkol mashihaa!
Thava sharane mruthanaam daasannanpaal vaathil thura-kke-na-me.

Povuka sahajaa!-karayaruthe naathan prabhayil-paarppikkum
vazhi kaanikkum parudeesin kaaval krobe maa-laa-khaa

mruthalokattheennaa laasarkkuththaanam na-lkiya naadam
kabarathil ninnum ninne vilicchetteetum paru-dee-saa-yil.

Mashihaa nrupathe!- srushttipathe sarvva rahasyam - kaabone!
Naathaa! Krupayaal njangale nin chirakin maravil cherkke-nam

nin sharanatthil-nin krupayil nidrithanaamee-sodarane
ninnaagamanapperunnaalil nin krupa nerittee-te-nam
baarekmor. Shubaho ... Menaolam
janakaathmaja paa-vana roohaa! Sathyakeshaa!-kalppanayaal vaangiyoraathmaavangeykkaayu vandanavum sthuthiyum-na-lkum.
(kukkiliyon)

naathaa! Ninkaluyartthunnennaathmatthe-hale-u haa
neeyen sharanam njaan lajjikkaruthe-deveshaa!

Vyrikal dambham kaattaruthenmel-haale-u haa-
lajjikkaruthe ninnaa-shitharaarum

lajjikkum doshikal vyarththathayaal-haale-u haa-
kartthaave! Kaattuka nin-paathakale.

Ariyikkanamenne nin cheruvazhikal-haale-u haa-
neril nayicchenne parishee-lippikka
baarekmor, shubaho .. Menaolam …
(ekkbo)

sarvveshaa mashihaa! Vishraanthiyumaanandamathum daa-sarkkarulka
maranam kykkondonaam nee paathaa-lasthithare
naasham theertthezhunnelppippaan saakshaatthaam jeevoththaanangal
vaagdattham cheythothiya pol aashvaasamavarkkuththaane nalka.
sthaumenkaalos…
(thakseptho-hoydenmodrolon)

sthaa-nabhramshatthaal srushtikalakhilam sambhramapoorvvam mariyumpol
aadithyanumampiliyum thaarakalum prabhayillaathaayu marayunnu.
Lokam srashtaavin vaakkaalanthyaavasthayiletthunnu
paate kabarukalilakippilarunnu niryaathanmaaruyarunnu
ne-rum neethiyumulkkollum niyathavidhikkaayu vidhigeham praapikkunnu.
moriyo…
(kolo-moraheemin)

aadamilaa-rambhicchaayathamaayu mi-shihaayolam maranam neenaaloti
/tmashihaayammaranatthinnadhikaaram
/tozhivaakki-paapatthin muna neekki
ghoshikkunnellaa thalamurayum skeeppaayinmel netiyathaam vijayatthe.

Punaruththaa-natthil maanjeetum mruthiyotu paapam, lajjithanaakum saatthaan
/tneethiparanmaarellaam modikkum
/tshobhanamaam vasanatthaal bhooshitharaayu
deepikayaa-licchittavaretthum manavaalanumaayu manavaraye pookituvaan.
baarekmor. Shubaho ...

gaathrattho-taathmaavothunnu sasamaadhaanam priyasahajaa maruvuka nee
/tpokunnen-ninnarikeenninneram
/tnikhileshan kalppikkum-sthaanatthil
kartthaavil-njaanaa-shikkunnunduththaanatthil ninne kaanaan veendum.
menaolam…

mishihaaraa-jaavin varavinkal druthavaranmaar kaahalamoothunneram
/tkabarukalum paarakalum poliyumutan
/tmrutharellaamuththaanam cheytheetum.
Deepikayaa-licchittavaretthum manavaalanumaayu manavaraye pookituvaan.
(madarosho-thubaulaman)

nyaayaadhipa naathaa-ee-shoye!
Vidhivijayam netu-nno-n dhanyan.

bhraathaakkanmaare!-sa-shraddham-
kettarivin ningal-sa-mpatthum
saundaryavumaajnjaa-sha-kthiyathum
poyppoyu nishesham maa-njeetum.
Nithyam vaazhunnon-thaan-dhanyan.

Sodararanyo-nyam mallittu
maddhye mruthi ve-gam che-nnetthi
amgangaleye-llaam che-dicchu
bhaagambhaagam ver-paa-taakki.
Kartthaavineyaarnnon-thaan-dhanyan.

Mruthasanketham njaan-praa-picchu
modakaram theja-sa-ngilla.
Neeyen thejasaa-vu-ka naathaa!
Shaashvatha thejase!-ni-nnaal njaan
aanandasthaanam-praa-pikkum.
(ooneeso-breekkumsheeho)

u-ththaanadine-mruthajanathaykkuyirekee
sho-bhanagaathram-nalkum msheehaa dhanyan.

He!-mruthigathare-uththaanam-druthametthum
khe-dikkendaa-dehatthin-naashatthil
/tsundaramaay-ningale nirmmicchon
/tgaathratthi-nnuththaanam nalki
sarvvarkkum-prathidaanam-yogyatha polaruleetum.

Aardratha moolam-paathaalam pooki mruthar-
kkellaaperkkum-maarggam kaanicchone!
/taadaamya-rkkuththaanam nalkaan
/tanthuyadine-nee vanneetumpol
ninnilura-ngum daasa-nanpotu nal-kuka jeevan.

Haa!-snehithare!-mruthidoothan -vannetthi
ve-gam povaa-navanenne dhruthi kootti
/tparichithare-kandeetaanavano-
/ttanuvaadam-njaanabhyarththicchu
yaachanayum-kozhakalum-kykkondillavanayyo.

Njaan cheyyunne-nthenpriyare vathsalare!
No-kkeetunnen-pizha enne vidhinilaye,
/tenpaapam-njaanorkkunnenne
/tava thetum-sambhramamiyalunnen
anputayon thanvaravil-krupa cheyvaanarththippin.

Haa!-sodarare-mruthirachitham-madakaramaam
ee-paaneeyam-paarkkilaho-bahuthiktham
/tsutharithinaal thaathaneyum jananee-
/tjanakanmaar-vathsalasuthareyum
orttheetu-nnillithine-niyamicchon-vaazhvutayon
moriyo…
(maar yaakkobinte bovooso)

dy-vaathmajane! Shaashvatharaajyatthaashvaasam nin
daa-sannekuka dhaarmmika shuddhanmaarotoppam.

Kallarayinnum mruthareyettittuththaanatthil
the-jomayamaam vasthram nalkunnone sthothram.
Dyvatthaal preshithanaam doothan bheethipradanaam
shee-ghram preshippiccheetumpolettam ghoran.

Paa-pam theendiyoraathmatthe javamingetthikke-
nnee-renotunnathanaamgyatthaal kalppikkunnu.
Doo-than thaanittekeetunnu mruthiyin shiksha
thaa-dikkunnu maranaasthratthaal druddagaathratthe.

Gaa-thramashesham jvaramaam dahanan baadhikkunnu
vedanayaalasthikalanyonyam thikkeetunnu.
Sankatabhaaram chitthatthe haa! Mathanam cheyyoo-
mumpil kaaryam sarvvavumonnaayu vanneetunnu.

The-jorandham sundaranethram mangeetunnu
chundukal randum maranatthin veenjulkkollunnu.
Ma-nnaalaadaamine nirmmicchon thaathan sthuthyan
krooshin paataal rakshicchonaam puthran vandyan.

Anthuyam jeevan nalkeettavane makkalotoppam
the-jasaniyiccheetum roohaa sthothaarhan thaan.
Kallarayinnum mruthare etteettuththaanatthil
the-jomayamaam vasthram nalkunnone sthothram.
